Package edu.stanford.nlp.trees.international.negra

Classes, and JFlex source file, for reading and tokenization of NEGRA corpus export-format files.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NegraHeadFinder
    HeadFinder for the Negra Treebank.
    NegraLabel  
    NegraPennLanguagePack
    Language pack for Negra and Tiger treebanks after conversion to PTB format.
    NegraPennTokenizer
    Produces a tokenizer for the NEGRA corpus in context-free Penn Treebank format.
    NegraPennTreeNormalizer
    Tree normalizer for Negra Penn Treebank format.
    NegraPennTreeReaderFactory
    A TreeReaderFactory for the Negra and Tiger treebanks in their Penn Treebank compatible export format.

Package edu.stanford.nlp.trees.international.negra Description

Classes, and JFlex source file, for reading and tokenization of NEGRA corpus export-format files. These are for use with the NEGRA and TIGER treebanks of German newspaper text.
Author:
Roger Levy
